001package com.github.sormuras.bach.builder;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import java.io.File;
005import java.nio.file.Path;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.Optional;
008import java.util.StringJoiner;
009
010/** Contains methods creating new builder instances, e.g. building conventional Java projects. */
011public record BuilderFactory(Bach bach) {
012
013  public Conventional.Builder conventional() {
014    var unnamedSpace =
015        new Conventional.Space(
016            Optional.empty(), List.of(), List.of("."), List.of(), Path.of("modules"));
017    return new Conventional.Builder(bach, unnamedSpace);
018  }
019
020  public Conventional.Builder conventional(String space) {
021    if (space.isEmpty()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("space name must not be empty");
022
023    var moduleSourcePather = new StringJoiner(File.separator).add(".").add("*").add(space);
024    var namedSpace =
025        new Conventional.Space(
026            Optional.of(space),
027            List.of(),
028            List.of(moduleSourcePather.toString(), moduleSourcePather.add("java").toString()),
029            List.of(),
030            Path.of(space, "modules"));
031    return new Conventional.Builder(bach, namedSpace);
032  }
033}
